short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates no-show processing for Booking.com admin interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Booking.com No-Show Automator

## Description
Streamline your Booking.com property management with this efficient automation tool designed specifically for handling no-show cases. This extension automatically processes no-show reservations while intelligently skipping reservations with virtual credit cards or existing payments, ensuring safe and compliant handling of your bookings.

## Key Features
• Automates the no-show marking process across multiple reservation tabs
• Intelligently identifies and skips reservations with virtual credit cards
• Automatically bypasses already processed payments
• Provides real-time progress tracking
• Includes safety checks to prevent double-processing
• Works with Booking.com's interface

## How It Works
1. Open your pending no-show reservations in separate tabs
2. Click the extension icon to open the side panel
3. Press "Process No-Shows" to begin automation
4. Watch as the extension safely processes each tab
5. View detailed results showing processed, skipped, and VCC-protected reservations

## Safety Features
• Automatically skips reservations with virtual credit cards
• Avoids processing already paid reservations
• Includes verification steps to ensure accurate processing
• Provides clear status updates for each action

## Perfect For
• Property managers handling multiple no-shows
• Hotels and accommodations using Booking.com
• Front desk staff processing end-of-day no-shows
• Anyone looking to streamline their Booking.com administrative tasks

## Benefits
• Save time by processing multiple no-shows at once
• Reduce human error in no-show processing
• Protect virtual credit card reservations
• Maintain accurate booking records
• Improve operational efficiency


Version: 0.0.3
